title: MY series hydraulic / pneumatic composer US-MY-2500-6B
title_uz: MY seriyali gidravlik / pnevmatik yog'och jipslash uskunasi US-MY-2500-6B
title_ru: Гидравлический / пневматический компрессор серии MY US-MY-2500-6B
title_en: MY series hydraulic / pneumatic composer US-MY-2500-6B
short_description: This US-MY-2500-6B model MY series hydraulic/pneumatic composer is used for gluing and jointing different types of wood and board materials together. The working volume of this equipment is 2500 x 1250 mm, and the working thickness of the equipment is 15 - 90 mm. Also, the power of the hydraulic motor in the equipment is 4 KW, and the power of the rotary motor is 1.5 KW. In addition, the air pressure in the equipment is 0.6 MPa. The total dimensions of the equipment are 4980 x 3900 x 3800 mm, and the weight is 4000 kg.
short_description_uz: Ushbu US-MY-2500-6B modeldagi MY seriyali gidravlik/pnevmatik kompensator uskunasi turli xildagi yog'och va taxta materiallari bo'laklarini bir-biriga yelimlab, yopishtirib, birlashtirib berish vazifasini bajaradi. Bu uskunadagi ish hajmi 2500 x 1250 mm bo'lib, uskunaning ishlash qalinligi esa 15 - 90 mmni tashkil etadi. Shuningdek, uskunadagi gidravlik dvigatel quvvati 4 KW bo'lib, aylanuvchi motor quvvati esa 1.5 KW hisoblanadi. Bundan tashqari, uskunadagi havo bosimi 0.6 mpa hisoblanadi. Uskunaning umumiy o'lchamlari 4980 x 3900 x 3800 mm, og'irligi esa 4000 kgni tashkil etadi.
short_description_ru: Этот гидравлический/пневматический компоновщик серии US-MY-2500-6B модели MY используется для склеивания и соединения различных видов древесины и плитных материалов. Рабочий объем этого оборудования 2500 х 1250 мм, а рабочая толщина оборудования 15 - 90 мм. Также мощность гидромотора в оборудовании 4 КВт, а мощность роторного мотора 1.5 КВт. Кроме того, давление воздуха в оборудовании составляет 0.6 МПа. Габаритные размеры оборудования составляют 4980 х 3900 х 3800 мм, а вес 4000 кг.
short_description_en: This US-MY-2500-6B model MY series hydraulic/pneumatic composer is used for gluing and jointing different types of wood and board materials together. The working volume of this equipment is 2500 x 1250 mm, and the working thickness of the equipment is 15 - 90 mm. Also, the power of the hydraulic motor in the equipment is 4 KW, and the power of the rotary motor is 1.5 KW. In addition, the air pressure in the equipment is 0.6 MPa. The total dimensions of the equipment are 4980 x 3900 x 3800 mm, and the weight is 4000 kg.
